description: This table contains information about Professional Billing transaction matching for a given statement.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement print or detail bill record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: Professional Billing transaction ID in matched transaction table.

columns.name: MATCH_TX_ID
columns.description: Matched Professional Billing transaction ID in matched transaction table.

columns.name: MATCH_DATE
columns.description: Matched date in matched transaction table.

columns.name: UNMATCH_DATE
columns.description: Unmatched date in matched transaction table.

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.description: Amount (self pay + insurance) matched or unmatched in matched transaction table.

columns.name: INS_AMT
columns.description: Insurance amount matched or unmatched in matched transaction table.

columns.name: SP_AMT
columns.description: Self-pay amount matched or unmatched in matched transaction table.
